title: Cedar Breaks National Monument: History & Culture
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture        President Franklin D Roosevelt        On August 22, 1933, President Franklin D. Roosevelt declared Cedar Breaks as a National Monument. Click on the links below to learn more about the area and the historic structures within the park.      Cedar Breaks Historic Lodge Civilian Conservation Corps (CCC) Historic Visitor Center Southern Paiute To learn more about each of these, visit our History brochure.
